column5: Hey I can actually relate my bf did this a little over 8 months ago. Itâ€™s a rollercoaster. I got better for a month and then had a mental breakdown for a month. Donâ€™t over think it, just do it! If they donâ€™t respond or donâ€™t like you thatâ€™s their problem not yours! Whatâ€™s the worst that could happen? And? Exactly. Just do it if anything it shows who they are and who you are!

He ended his life a month later. Called me and said he loved me but he hated his life. God is in control. Thereâ€™s a reason you found her and a reason sheâ€™s alive. It was meant to be. Iâ€™ve had that guilt too. Iâ€™ve attempted and been very depressed and thatâ€™s not what that person would want for you. Try to be somebody they can look up to. I wouldâ€™ve done the same thing... I wish everyday my best friend was here he didnâ€™t know it but he was the only reason i was happy. Life sucks without his smile. Someone thinks It would suck without yours too. My biggest regret is that I couldnâ€™t stop him that time so you would have regretted it either way, do not beat yourself up. She put you in that situation and remember, Youâ€™re not in control.

The path youâ€™re going down is a dark one if you donâ€™t stop and turn around. Just remember those dark thoughts arenâ€™t true and never give up!! Trigger warning; I dated an alcoholic and I was also an alcoholic I slept on the couch one night when he was in a rage and he came in a threw me off the couch and told me to get in his bed. Then he punched a wall. I was scared for my life I called a friend and she said to leave but I was seriously scared. I forgave this and brushed it off as a drunk incident. It happened again two months later. Another month after that and he held a gun to his head and said letâ€™s do it together. I had to tackle him &he blamed it on the alcohol.. he quit drinking through the week but then he started having anxiety attacks and blaming me on the weekends and would break up with me. I told him next time he ends it Iâ€™m leaving and I did. He drank a half gallon and called me saying he loved me and ended his life. Iâ€™m just saying too much alcohol isnâ€™t something to mess around with. I loved the guy with all my heart... he just didnâ€™t love himself and he was an amazing person sober. I would address it now. Your gut doesnâ€™t lie.
